projects.name: ShawnKristek.com

img.alt: Shawn Kristek.com Full Stack Software Engineer

projects.description: This live version of my portfolio is a heavily customized Python and Flask app adapted from a BootstrapMade front-end template. It was an enjoyable exploration of Python and Flask thanks to the similarities shared with Ruby on Rails. This site features a mix of CSS and JS interactive elements, and dynamic data loading using Jinja2 and JSON.
projects.technologies: Python, Flask, JS, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, Jinja, JSON

projects.name: LoveYouLater Productions

img.alt: Love You Later Productions: Photography and Videography

projects.description: Love You Later Productions is a photography and videography side hustle for George Maturino. Together we brainstormed and designed his branding and this online portfolio as an easy way to show potential clients his work.

projects.name: Wertz Werkz

gallery.alt: Wertz Werkz Collapsible carnival games homepage
Wertz Werkz quality games for all ages

projects.description: While attending Texas A&M I met the serial entrepreneur Andy Wertz. One of his favorite ways to give back was to hire college students to provide them with a pay check and work experience for their resumes. He was in need of a web presence and branding so I built him a Wordpress site as well as set up his social media profiles. Many students since then have worked on his web presence, but much of my work for the overall site theme, branding, and functionality is still present.
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Wordpress

projects.name: BSWOLE Fitness

img.alt: BSWOLE Own life's BS in health and wealth

gallery.alt: BSWOLE health and wealth coaching homepage
BSWOLE health and wealth coaching Shawn Kristek your coach

projects.description: BSWOLE Health and Wealth Coaching is one of my experiments in entrepreneurship. This one page Wordpress site is designed to inspire individuals to to take action with improving their health. Every aspect of the design was built by me using a mix of plugins and softwares.
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Wordpress

projects.name: Skull Yum

gallery.alt: Skull Yum tasty skull apparel homepage
Skull Yum tasty skull apparel catalog
Skull Yum tasty skull apparel branding
Skull Yum tasty skull apparel responsive design

projects.description: Skull Yum is a print on demand business that sells a variety of food themed sugar skull designs. My wife and I built every aspect of this business from the ground up. It was an experiment in branding, entrepreneurship, and an exploration of Shopify.
projects.technologies: HTML, CSS, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Shopify

projects.name: Quotivation
projects.description: A fun and colorful random quote generator done as an exercise in APIs: Twitter and Forismatic.com
projects.technologies: HTML5, CSS, jQuery, Javascript, AJAX, APIs
